terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - I have a desire for a cigarette right now.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Desire Cigarette Right Now

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - Nothing would be better than smoking a cigarette right now.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Nothing Better Than Cigarette Now

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - If it were possible, I probably would smoke now.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Probably Would Smoke Now

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - I could control things better right now if I could smoke.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Control Things Better Could Smoke

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - All I want right now is a cigarette.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - All I Want Right Now Is Cigarette
synonyms: QSUB01-All I Want Right Now Is Cigarette

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - I have an urge for a cigarette.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Have an Urge for a Cigarette
synonyms: QSUB01-Have an Urge for a Cigarette

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - A cigarette would taste good now.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - A Cigarette Would Taste Good Now
synonyms: QSUB01-A Cigarette Would Taste Good Now

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - I would do almost anything for a cigarette right now.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Do Anything for a Cigarette Now
synonyms: QSUB01-Do Anything for a Cigarette Now

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - Smoking would make me less depressed.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Smoking Make Me Less Depressed

terms.definition: Questionnaire on Smoking Urges-Brief - I am going to smoke as soon as possible.
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Urges - Going Smoke as Soon as Possible
